::Decapitron/Legtrap/Headshot::

      Decapitron looked at Switchblade.

 =
     "Hi!  Sorry for coming in hear without knocking, we saw that you were =
Decepticons so we figured that we would be welcomed here, us being Deceptic=
ons.  Oh, I almost forgot, my name's Decapitron, these are two of my men, H=
eadshot," He tilted his head to Headshot,"And Legtrap," He tilted his head =
the other way to Legtrap.

     "Nice to meet you!" Headshot said.

     "H=
owdy!  Lemme guess, you want me to go get you somethin from the-" He is cut=
 off by Headshot.

     "Whadda ya say we all head to the mess hall, I need=
 an energin refill anyway!" Headshot said.

     "Good idea!  Come on, come=
 with us to the mess hall," Decapitron said to Switchblade, who was stretch=
ing out.

      Headshot and Legtrap went to the mess hall, and sat down wi=
th a cup of energin and a few energon cubes each.  Decapitron headed to the=
 mess hall, motioning for Switchblade to follow.

OOC: Ok, this is just for=
 some people who don't know what a "mess hall" is, so I'll tell you what I =
know based on what I've seen in previous posts: The Mess Hall is the place =
where you can, like, get refreshments.  Energin is a special drink.  Energo=
n cubes, are, well, all I know is that you eat them or something.
